label: cascading_failure_01_dx_storage_capacity_027
content:
## 2026-01-28 Daily Operations Summary

### Endpoint Performance
- /storage/cluster_capacity: REQUESTS req | p50: N/A p95: N/A p99: N/A | err: 0% (0 errors) | success: 100%

- /storage/reliability: REQUESTS req | p50: N/A p95: N/A p99: N/A | err: 0% (0 errors) | success: 100%
- /storage/metadata: REQUESTS req | p50: 87000 p95: 87000 p99: N/A | err: 0% (0 errors) | success: 100%
- /storage/maintenance: REQUESTS req | p50: N/A p95: N/A p99: N/A | err: 0% (0 errors) | success: 100%

### Infrastructure
- stor-a-23: CPU 97% | Mem 91% | Disk Used 99% | Disk Busy 99% | Conns: N/A | Net: 11.8/10.2 Gbps
- stor-b-22: CPU 80% | Mem 82% | Disk Used 98% | Disk Busy 97% | Conns: N/A | Net: 8.9/8.1 Gbps
- stor-c-25: CPU 71% | Mem 77% | Disk Used 97% | Disk Busy 92% | Conns: N/A | Net: 7.3/6.7 Gbps
- meta-02: CPU 85% | Mem 96% | Disk Used 91% | Disk Busy 85% | Conns: N/A | Net: 5.0/4.2 Gbps

### Connection Pools
- pool-1: active 120 | idle 30 | waiting 5 | exhaustion 2 | max: 150 | avg_wait: 12ms
- pool-2: active 95 | idle 25 | waiting 3 | exhaustion 1 | max: 130 | avg_wait: 9ms
- pool-3: active 80 | idle 20 | waiting 4 | exhaustion 0 | max: 100 | avg_wait: 7ms

### CDN & Caching
- Hit rate: 86.7% | Bandwidth: 4.2 Gbps | Origin requests: 7200

### Alerts
- [SEVERE] quota_blocks on hostname: 8
- [SEVERE] capacity_pressure on hostname: 91.6%
- [WARNING] compaction_pending: 152
- [WARNING] scrub_errors: 52
- [CRITICAL] metadata_cache_hit: 86.7%
- [CRITICAL] manifest_backlog: 7200

### Deployments & Changes
- No deployments or changes today.

### Events
- Massive ingest (+246 TB) pushed utilization to 91.6% and triggered 8 quota hard blocks; executed emergency write restrictions for three non-essential namespaces.
- Compaction pending spiked to 152 with disk busy p95 96.2%; scheduled immediate compaction surge and reduced background scrub concurrency to avoid saturation.
- Scrub errors rose to 52; focused on the noisiest keyspaces and requested tenant-side delete batching to reduce tombstone fragmentation.
- Metadata cache hit dropped to 86.7% with manifest backlog 7.2k; paused all optional inventory jobs and increased metadata worker count by 1.

### On-Call
- Shift: Ben K. 14 pages. 24 tickets. Status: Degraded; severe capacity pressure with quota blocks and compaction/scrub overload. Emergency write restrictions and metadata/job deferrals applied; compaction surge underway.
